entry.title: JKM Double Fold Bias Tape - 1/4" Folded Width
entry.summary:
Vendor: JKM
Type: Trims & Home Décor
Price: 4.19

Unique Double Fold Bias Tape by HA Kidd is used to stabilize or finish raw edges with stretch seams around armholes, necklines etc. Also used to finish edges on quilts, and in home décor. It also can be used as decorative binding or casing. Machine wash 40°, tumble dry and iron at low heat, dry cleanable.(Product Characteristic: Bias Tape; Binding Pkgs) / (Fabric Content: 65% Polyester 35% Cotton)
